attributes.action: We want 3 stages of Action with regards to Knife Crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Firstly.

An opportunity for people to hand in their knives in a well advertised Amnesty.

Secondly.

A mandatory sentence of 4 years for anyone found in possession of a knife within an urban area. The 4 years would be served without opportunity for early release.
Thirdly.
Anyone found guilty of stabbing another person will receive a mandatory sentence of 15 years without possibility of early release.
